name: CLOCKED OUT (clonethirteen, Spacespy)
description:
In CLOCKED OUT you play as a Finn, a cursed clock that is running out of time. The game is a precision platformer where you can gather more time to complete the course. 

CONTROLS - A/D to move Left/Right, S to jump down thru some platforms, and SPACE to jump.

To be continued.
(Collect all shadow clocks for a special surprise)
